term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - electron spectroscopy for chemical analysis (ESCA)
term.title: electron spectroscopy for chemical analysis

item.text: Type of spectroscopy involving the measurement of the kinetic energy of electrons emitted by chemical substances usually as a result of excitation by monochromatic X-rays.

sources.item: PAC, 1976, 45, 221. 'Nomenclature and Spectral Presentation in Electron Spectroscopy Resulting from Excitation by Photons' on page 223 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197645030221)
